snippet.title: Sonic.EXE Re-Take (The Devil Within)
snippet.description:
This game was made by the same person that made Afflicted.ME

Hello guys, my name is Tom Lewis. Back in 2011 a friend of mine passed away, his name was Kyle Carter, the only reason why I'm talking about him right now, is cause I recently got something from him. Today Is my birthday and as I usually do, I check my mail-box in case anyone sends a gift, such as my parente Who live fare from me. I found a kind of gift box that was sent by him. At first I thought that it was just a prank, but no one here knows about what happened to him, I mean I moved away from my country after the accident. Wanna know what happened? Well, I don't really know what happened, I kinda find it hard to talk about. I was going back home while I saw the door of Kyle's house open. I tried searching for him since I had to give him back some stuff he gave me for work. I went into the living room and what I found was... terrifying. He was laying on the floor, dismembered. I had to move away from my own country, that accident destroyed my reputation, I got fired from my dream job at SEGA. Even if the judge knew that I was innocent, everyone thought that I was the murderer. Now, back to that something that I found in my letterbox. There was my old SEGA Genesis and a cartridge called "Memories from the past".I still haven't played it, I just finished mounting that cartridge, oh wait, it is loading, I didn't think that that would've worked, wait, is this a Sonic Th̴͎̭̫̬͙͉̝͕̓̋̐͋̊̂̏͂͌̚͜ë̷̹͍̩̺̙̗͔̼̠́̍̋̆̄̓̿̚̕͜ ̷͖͍̃̒̎Ĥ̷̫̱͌e̸̡͙̲̯̘̥͌̂̒̅̅͝ͅd̸̦͎̪̈̄̉̄g̵͎̪̠͙̠̜̫̘̠̝͛́͂̆̑͒͝e̸̲͎͎͚̠̥͎̠͑͋̽̈͊̆̉̚ͅͅh̸͚̯̓́o̴̧̡̞̙͛̀͛̌̚g̷̖̩͠ ̷̞̕

Game: https://gamejolt.com/games/TDW/895172
